mapper.select: SELECT ploID, SUM(CASE WHEN methodID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TotalVehicleMethodDay, SUM(CASE WHEN methodID = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TotalVehicleMethodNight, SUM(CASE WHEN methodID = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TotalVehicleMethodOvernight, COUNT(*) AS TotalVehicle FROM Reservation WHERE ploID = #{ploID}

SELECT plo.ploID as ploID, plo.fullName as fullName, plo.parkingName as parkingName, COUNT(reservation.ploID) AS total FROM reservation LEFT JOIN plo ON reservation.ploID = plo.ploID WHERE MONTH(reservation.startTime) = MONTH(#{inputDate}) AND YEAR(reservation.startTime) = YEAR(#{inputDate}) GROUP BY plo.ploID, plo.fullName, plo.parkingName ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT plo.ploID as ploID, plo.fullName as fullName, plo.parkingName as parkingName, SUM(reservation.price) AS revenue FROM reservation LEFT JOIN plo ON reservation.ploID = plo.ploID WHERE MONTH(reservation.startTime) = MONTH(#{inputDate}) AND YEAR(reservation.startTime) = YEAR(#{inputDate}) GROUP BY plo.ploID, plo.fullName, plo.parkingName ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer.fullName as fullName, customer.phoneNumber as phoneNumber, COUNT(reservation.customerID) AS total FROM reservation LEFT JOIN customer ON reservation.customerID = customer.customerID WHERE MONTH(reservation.startTime) = MONTH(#{inputDate}) AND YEAR(reservation.startTime) = YEAR(#{inputDate}) GROUP BY customer.fullName, customer.phoneNumber ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reservationID, customerID, ploID, statusID, licensePlateID, startTime, endTime, price, checkOut, checkIn, methodID FROM reservation WHERE statusID = #{status} AND customerID = #{customerID};

SELECT reservationID, customerID, ploID, statusID, licensePlateID, startTime, endTime, price, checkOut, checkIn, methodID FROM reservation WHERE reservationID = #{reservationID} AND customerID = #{customerID};
SELECT reservationID, customerID, ploID, statusID, licensePlateID, startTime, endTime, price, checkOut, checkIn, methodID FROM Reservation WHERE reservationID = #{reservationID}
